explanation: Funds are required for the following:

Funds are excess to need from the B-52 Global Positioning System Interface Unit (GPS-IU) Replacement effort because the current GPS-IU contract has concluded without yielding a fieldable solution that meets Air Force Global Strike Command requirements. As a result, the program has been cancelled per the Acquisition Decision Memorandum. There are no other known progratn requirements for the funding at this time and no impacts to the program.
